basics.name: GOPI KRISHNA GAJAM
basics.summary: Software Engineer with experience building production-grade full-stack and AI-powered systems using Python, Node.js, Django, and cloud platforms (AWS & GCP). Passion for integrating LLMs, designing retrieval-augmented pipelines, building secure APIs, and optimizing performance, reliability, and cost for real-world applications.

experience.title: Software Engineer
experience.description: Led development of production applications using Node.js, Django, PostgreSQL, and React Native, building over 100 REST APIs and designing schemas for authentication, messaging, e-commerce, and document workflows. Integrated LLM features for document summarization and workflow automation, reducing manual processing time by 35%. Optimized AI inference paths and deployed cloud infrastructure on GCP, enabling 3x traffic scaling.

experience.title: Software Engineer Intern
experience.description: Contributed to end-to-end development of a production application, implementing backend services, database schemas, and REST APIs. Gained hands-on experience with cloud deployments, real-time systems, and production debugging.

experience.title: Teaching Assistant – Information System Design Strategies
experience.description: Assisted students with system design concepts including scalability, trade-offs, and architectural patterns. Supported course delivery by reviewing design approaches and reinforcing best practices in backend and distributed system design.

education.degree: Master of Science in Computer Engineering - Data Engineering
Bachelor of Technology in Electrical Engineering

projects.title: GhostWriter AI-Powered Content Generation Platform
projects.description: An end-to-end LLM-based content generation system for long-form outputs, designed with constrained prompt templates and evaluation workflows to improve output consistency and reduce hallucinations by 30%.

projects.title: Vakalat Multi-Tenant Law Firm Management SaaS
projects.description: A multi-tenant SaaS platform architected with JWT-based RBAC, over 50 REST APIs, and normalized schemas supporting India-specific legal workflows and future RAG-based document search.

projects.title: StudyBuddy Collaborative Learning Platform
projects.description: A platform built with real-time collaboration features including study groups, role-based access, and threaded messaging using WebSockets. Integrated AI-powered topic summarization to improve discussion discoverability.

projects.title: Daily DSA Article Generator (AI-Powered)
projects.description: An AI-first, cloud-ready pipeline that autonomously selects non-repeating DSA topics and generates structured one-page articles, productionized via Cloud Run Jobs with scheduled execution and persistent state.

cta.message: Seeking challenging opportunities to leverage AI and full-stack development skills.
